channel.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]
channel.description:
Hey Guys, Soooo.. My Server's Donator Symbol Is playerRights = 5) But If I Want It For Donator = 1) How Can I Do That?
PLEASE POST EVEN IF NOT TO SURE! I REALLY NEED THIS THE GUY THAT DONATED IS FLAMING :mad:

item.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=472702.msg3458635#msg3458635 date=1294269202]
I would suggest Just looking if playerRights == 5
in every file untill you find something that says
out.write(7);
or something…
[/quote]You have my respect as you are on the right track. :)[/quote]
off topic:Actualy you are one of the few people i would love to have respect from so thanks

On Topic:Would be nice if this guy would tell us if he has figured it out or not so people would stop posting

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help ASAP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xocean xocean
item.description:
@xocean wrote:

Well this is pretty basic knowledge…

Basically… you see all of your stuff on your character files when they are saved ?

Like PlayerRights = 5.

All you need to do is add them… Basically copy n paste here’s mine…

PlayerSave.java Search for this .

} else if (token.equals("pc-points")) { p.pcPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);

99% of servers have pc-points… simply copy n paste mine under it.

} else if (token.equals("isDonator")) { p.isDonator = Integer.parseInt(token2);
Then add the method again hold on i’ll post rest when i get back – tea–

Ok then search for this.

characterfile.write("pc-points = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.pcPoints), 0, Integer.toString(p.pcPoints).length());

Ok then we need to place this under it or were ever you please

characterfile.write("isDonator = ", 0, 12); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.isDonator), 0, Integer.toString(p.isDonator).length());

Ok then for client-sided please post on client side help. i’ll help if needed.

Enjoy, client sided is only needed if uwant to make a donator icon for the donator side e.g

Read full topic
